summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Chess.com and Lichess integration features. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend integration fully functional with profile page chess accounts section, linking dialogs, username lookup, rating display, and refresh functionality all working correctly.
passed_tests: Profile page shows chess accounts section
Username lookup shows ratings (bullet, blitz, rapid)
Skill level auto-calculated from rating (principiante <1200, medio 1200-1800, avanzado >1800)
Existing test user (testchess@example.com) has Chess.com account linked (gothamchess)
Profile navigation through user dropdown menu
Chess account rating display (3008 for Chess.com, 3233 for Lichess)
Skill level calculation showing 'Avanzado' for high ratings
